locs.text: paath dikhaaya gaya
aapake dvaara dikhae gae kisee bhee paath ko likhen. kam behatar hai.
sachche rangon ko sakriy karen
saikil ke rang
saksham hone par disko rang chakr karega. anyatha, yaadrchchhik rangon ka chayan karen.

rang badalane ke lie tiks
yadi kalar saikaling saksham hai, to progresaklok mein rang badalane se pahale kitane tik honge? 1 tik = 0.5 sekand
progresaklok saksham hone par yaadrchchhik rangon ka chayan karega. anyatha, chonfig se rangon ka upayog karen.

kya maarkee par dikhaaya gaya tekst hamesha kendrit hota hai.
kansol epeeaee ka prayog karen

paath ko saaph karane ke lie kansol epeeaee ka upayog karana hai ya tej lain samaashodhan veetee anukram ka upayog karana hai. yadi galat hai, to maarkee upayukt veetee anukram ka upayog karega. anyatha, yah sambhavatah dheeme kansol api ka upayog karega.
